original_text: I give to you more than I give to your brothers. I give to you the good part of the land that I took from the Amorites. I fought against them with my weapons to take that land.’
korean_text: 내가 네게 네 형제보다 세겜 땅을 더 주었나니 이는 내가 내 칼과 활로 아모리 족속의 손에서 빼앗은 것이니라

sentences.original_text: I give to you more than I give to your brothers.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게는 네 형들에게 주는 것보다 더 준다.

sentences.original_text: I give to you the good part of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 그 땅의 좋은 부분을 준다.

sentences.original_text: that I took from the Amorites.
I fought against them with my weapons
